author: Sidney Fussell, Will Knight
title: The Apple-Google Contact Tracing Plan Won't Stop Covid Alone
description: Putting the privacy of these smartphone apps aside, few Americans have been tested—and there's a risk of false positives.
content: Apple and Google are offering a bold plan using signals from more than 3 billion smartphones to help stem the spread of the deadly coronavirus while protecting users privacy. But epidemiologists caution thatprivacy concerns asidethe scheme will be limited use… [+5982 chars]
